isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - DESCRIPTION - FENDERS

svcproc.title: FENDERS
svcproc.para: Fenders are part of the one-piece tilt type hood assembly on 5000 SFA, 5000 SBA (with fiberglass tilt hood, standard after August 1994), 9100, 9200, 9300, and 9400 Models.
Fenders on 9200 and 9400 Models after July 1996, and 9100 Model after March 1997, are part of a four-piece tilt type hood assembly. The fender sections can be removed and replaced if damaged.
On the 5000 SBA (with butterfly hood, optional after August 1994), the fender and inner splash panel are separate from the hood assembly and may be removed and installed separately as an assembly.
